citation: Proclamation under the Justice Legislation Amendment (Organisational Liability for Child Abuse) Act 2019 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Justice Legislation Amendment (Organisational Liability for Child Abuse) Act 2019

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Justice Legislation Amendment (Organisational Liability for Child Abuse) Act 2019 fix 1 May 2020 as the day on which that Act commences.

27 April 2020

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 April 2020

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
